Text.Language: Arip~recbeuin e~h~r/i e~jwn: w~ piar,/aggeloc e#y#u#: Rava/l p~ounof n~h/t: n~tef,a nennobi nan e~bol.
Intercede on our behalf, O holy archangel, Raphael the joy of all hearts, that He may forgive us our sins.
